bug.summary: Delay from .show until window appears in the foreground
bug.description: From when .show or .explore are called, it takes up to (what feels like about) a half second or so before the window appears. In some cases (not sure how to repro) it seems not to appear at all, until I switch to it. I think we may be able to use to fix this.
